artifacts.summary: Analysis of plan file status update gaps in /implement GATE OUT and skills Stage 7, with recommendations for verification and fixes

summary: Found that plan file status updates are documented in 3 of 4 implementation skills but not verified. The /implement GATE OUT checkpoint lacks plan file verification, and skill-neovim-implementation is missing plan file update code entirely. Recommended adding defensive verification to GATE OUT and improving sed commands with error checking.
